name: The Prodigal Soul
description:
The Prodigal Soul - a "detective" with elements of a "horror", where you have to find out what happened to the main character and find out the cause of a mental disorder, thereby unraveling the cause of the tragedy, but riddles and puzzles will bother you in every way, get ready...
As a result of the accident, the main character falls into a coma, where the game takes place. Don't forget - this is just a dream, it all depends on you...

The game is developed on the CRYENGINE engine

The game is an early Beta version, all bugs and errors will soon be fixed.
